plugin.name: Ad Window
plugin.change-notes:
[2024-01-09] update JP concat

[2022-03-23] Fix the bug of error display during remote design

[2022-03-23] Fix the bug of 'plugin manager pane' conflict

[2022-03-23] Fix the bug of macos12

[2020-12-21] Monitor window close.

[2021-5-17] Update the appearance. Use JavaFX.

[2021-10-11] Provide JP & KR version in the same plugin.
